bibl.title: Sulla biografia di Saffo. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The text of P. Oxy. XV, 1800 (= Pack2 2070), fr. 1 can be improved in certain parts. The questions of the name of the brother of Sappho Eurygyios and of the relevance of Herodot. II 134-5 concerning the chronology of the poetess are also discussed.
bibl.seg: Di Benedetto Vincenzo, Sulla biografia di Saffo. Avec résumé en anglais.

The text of P. Oxy. XV, 1800 (= Pack2 2070), fr. 1 can be improved in certain parts. The questions of the name of the brother of Sappho Eurygyios and of the relevance of Herodot. II 134-5 concerning the chronology of the poetess are also discussed.
